name: Leprechaun´s Treasure (Vinicius César)
description:
Leprechaun's Treasure
Plot

The old leprechaun, Torg,  has lose it's treasure.  A leprechaun can´t live whitout his treasure! So, Torg  entered the dangerous magical forest. Torg need to find the entrance of deeps. Guide Torg into the forest and find his treasure, but be warned, the magical forest is known to be damned. 

Development Status

This game is under development. Follow to receive the updates! Have fun!

Can you help ?

If you could support my work by making a donation  I would greatly appreciate it. I know that money can be tight, so please know that even $5 helps me a lot ! Let me know if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to answer them. Thank you!
